entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Snow mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
